operations.description: Create a new candidate and assign to a give Job
operations.notes: Create a new candidate and assign to a give Job. Returns a created Candidate object.

parameters.description: Candidate object that needs to be created. Please see the Model Schema on the right.
parameters.name: Candidate

operations.summary: Create a new candidate and assign to a give Job

operations.description: Parse a resume, create a candidate and assign to a given Job.
operations.notes: Parse a resume, create a candidate and assign to a given Job. Returns a created Candidate object.
operations.summary: Parse a resume, create a candidate and assign to a given Job

operations.notes: Find jobs by params. Returns a list of jobs.

parameters.description: full-text search query based on a job title, location; case insensitive; e.g. java developer
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: number of elements to return. max value is 100
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: number of elements to skip while processing result
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: city filter (part of the location object); can be used repeatedly; case insensitive; e.g. San Francisco; part of the Location object
parameters.name: city

parameters.description: department filter (department id); can be used repeatedly; case insensitive; e.g. “Marketing”; part of the Department object
parameters.name: department

parameters.description: ISO8601-formatted time boundaries for the job update time, Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZZ
parameters.name: updatedAfter

operations.description: Get content of a job with a given id.
operations.notes: Get content of a job with a given id. Returns a job details.
operations.summary: Get content of a job with a given id.

operations.description: Get hiring team of a job with a given id.
operations.notes: Get hiring team of a job with a given id. Returns a hiring team.
operations.summary: Get hiring team of a job with a given id.

operations.description: Get note of a job with a given id.
operations.notes: Get note of a job with a given id. Returns a note.
operations.summary: Get note of a job with a given id.

operations.notes: Enables you to create a new jobs. This operation requires passing an instance of the Job object as part of the POST request. Returns a created job.

parameters.description: Job object that needs to be created
parameters.name: Job

operations.notes: Update a job. Returns an updated job object.

operations.description: Add hiring team member of a job with a given id.
operations.notes: Add hiring team member of a job with a given id. Returns a hiring team member.
operations.summary: Add hiring team member of a job with a given id.

operations.description: Removes hiring team member of a job with a given id.
operations.notes: Removes hiring team member of a job with a given id. Returns a hiring team member.
operations.summary: Removes hiring team member of a job with a given id.

operations.description: Update note of a job with a given id.
operations.notes: Update note of a job with a given id. Note of maximum 20000 characters long is accepted. Returns a note.
operations.summary: Update note of a job with a given id.

operations.description:
Publishes a job to internal sources (Career Pages, Job Widget, Facebook App, WordPress Plugin, Posting API) and optionally to all free job aggregators.
By default it's set to publish to job aggregators.
It reflects a Publish action available in the SmartRecruiters UI.
Note: Internal sources depend on a company's payment plan.
operations.notes:
Publishes a job to internal sources (Career Pages, Job Widget, Facebook App, WordPress Plugin, Posting API) and optionally to all free job aggregators.
By default it's set to publish to job aggregators.
It reflects a Publish action available in the SmartRecruiters UI.
Note: Internal sources depend on a company's payment plan.

operations.description: Unpublishes a job from all sources
operations.notes: Unpublishes a job from all sources
operations.summary: Unpublishes a job from all sources

operations.description: Find and list publications for a job
operations.notes: Find and list publications for a job

parameters.description: publication status filter; when omitted, defaults to 'true' (only active publications are returned); 'false' returns active and inactive publications
parameters.name: activeOnly

operations.summary: Find and list publications for a job

operations.notes: Enables you to update job. This operation requires passing an instance of the Job object as part of the PUT request. Returns an updated job.

parameters.description: Job object that needs to be updated
parameters.name: Job

add.description: add operation. Value can be any JSON value.

copy.description: copy operation. "from" is a JSON Pointer.

move.description: move operation. "from" is a JSON Pointer.

remove.description: remove operation. Only a path is specified.

replace.description: replace operation. Value can be any JSON value.

test.description: test operation. Value can be any JSON value.

JSONPatch.description: A JSON Schema describing a JSON Patch
notes: Only required members are accounted for, other members are ignored
JSONPatch.title: JSON Patch
